channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump signs ‘One Big Beautiful Bill’ into law: What that means for your money
item.description: The bill will have ripple effects throughout the economy—and Americans' bank accounts.

item.title: At least 13 dead in Texas floods and more than 20 children missing from a girls summer camp
item.description: At least 10 inches of rain poured down overnight in central Kerr County, causing flash flooding of the Guadalupe River.

item.title: Trump plans to start notifying countries of U.S. tariffs up to 70%
item.description: Trump told reporters that about “10 or 12” letters would go out Friday, with additional letters coming “over the next few days.”

item.title: Democratic Congressman Suozzi’s $50,000 stock sale took advantage of a loophole in Congressional disclosure rules
item.description: The New York rep never disclosed owning the stock, prompting the question of how he managed to sell a security he didn’t appear to own in the first pl...

item.title: Wall Street was expecting a TACO Tuesday. But Dow futures fall 250 points after Trump says he will set tariffs as high as 70%
item.description: Trump said that about “10 or 12” tariff letters would go out Friday, with additional letters coming “over the next few days.”
